channel.title: [PI] Special Attack Bar Won't Show Up
channel.description:
I've been trying to add Dragon Claw Special Attack bar, but it just won't show up. I've added the Dragon Claw ID in the correct switches, such as the switch in the addSpecialBar method, the checkSpecAmount, along with the special attack in the activateSpecial void.
Am I missing anything?

item.title: [PI] Special Attack Bar Won't Show Up
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:

I’ve been trying to add Dragon Claw Special Attack bar, but it just won’t show up.
I’ve added the Dragon Claw ID in the correct switches, such as the switch in the addSpecialBar method, the checkSpecAmount, along with the special attack in the activateSpecial void.

Am I missing anything?

Read full topic
